column5: Hoping to get a few answers in regards to Internet in Hamilton township. Basically we're having a tough time finding a company that services the area, we move to the area in Aug and didn't think this would be a real issue . Any one use a particular company ? Thanks Ryan
have you tried shaw yet? or ruralwave
Do you have cable going to the house or is this rural area?
Explornet or Shaw. Maybe Nexicom, but I'm not sure they go that far.  S.
Great, thanks for the replys . The Mentioned company's are checking into it for us . Would have never thought this would be an issue 10 min outside of town LOL. Thanks again , Ryan

for the most part, internet access in rural areas is abysmal in ontario especially if you are used to / coming from a place with cable/dsl lines.  xplornet is garbage.  best bet is propably a local outfit.  talk to your neighbours.
